description.value:
Beginning at 18th level, the harmful energy of your spells intensifies. When you roll damage for a spell and roll the highest number possible on any of the dice, choose one of those dice, roll it again and add that roll to the damage. You can use the feature only once per turn.

Wild Magic Surge

d100 Effect
01 Roll on this table at the start of each of your turns for the next minute, ignoring this result on subsequent rolls.
02 Your skin becomes rough and textured like sandpaper until you finish a long rest.
03 For the next minute, you can see any invisible creature if you have line of sight to it.
04 You become petrified until the end of your next turn.
05 A modron chosen and controlled by the DM appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
06 Your blood turns green, reverting to its normal color when you finish a long rest.
07 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]{Fireball} as a 3rd-level spell centered on yourself.
08 One hostile creature within 60 feet teleports to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you.
09 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]{Magic Missile} as a 3rd-level spell.
10 You regain 1d4 expended sorcery points.
11 Roll a d10. Your height changes by a number of inches equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you shrink. If the roll is even, you grow.
12 Your copper coins become animated for 1 minute, flying around performing acrobatic stunts.
13 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{Confusion} centered on yourself.
14 You gain a burrow speed of 20 feet for the next minute.
15 For the next minute, you regain 5 hit points at the start of each of your turns.
16 Your clothing animates and pulls you out of the way of danger, giving you a +2 bonus to Dexterity saving throws for the next minute.
17 You grow a long beard made of feathers that remain until you sneeze, at which point the feathers explode out from your face.
18 For the next 1d4 hours, you gain resistance to psychic damage.
19 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.etgcR9wqmrhyZ0tx]{Grease} centered on yourself.
20 For the next minute, any metal object you touch not worn or carried by another creature rusts away to nothingness.
21 Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the next spell you cast in the next minute that involves a saving throw.
22 For the next hour, you cannot be restrained, grappled, or knocked prone.
23 Your skin turns a vibrant shade of blue. A @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{Remove Curse} spell can end this effect.
24 Your ears fill with cotton for the next hour, and you are deafened.
25 An eye appears on your forehead for the next minute. During that time, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
26 Your walking speed increases by 20 feet for the next minute.
27 For the next minute, all your spells with a casting time of 1 action have a casting time of 1 bonus action.
28 The next time you damage a creature with a cantrip within the next minute, you double the damage you deal.
29 You teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see.
30 You begin vibrating uncontrollably for the next minute. Attack rolls against you have disadvantage.
31 You are transported to the Astral Plane until the end of your next turn, after which time you return to the space you previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
32 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.2VF6FG3AQBK65057]{Jinx} targeting yourself.
33 Maximize the damage of the next damaging spell you cast within the next minute.
d100 Effect
34 You have advantage on attack rolls made before the end of your next turn.
35 Roll a d10. Your age changes by a number of years equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you get younger (minimum 1 year old). If the roll is even, you get older.
36 You can immediately cast a cantrip with a casting time of 1 action.
37 1d6 flumphs controlled by the DM appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of you and are frightened of you. They vanish after 1 minute.
38 You and all creatures within 20 feet of you are affected by the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.95K2aUhAGV9qXjnf]{Bane} spell for 1 minute.
39 You regain 2d10 hit points.
40 You gain truesight out to a range of 30 feet for the next hour.
41 A beast chosen and controlled by the DM appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
42 You turn into a potted plant until the start of your next turn. While a plant, you are incapacitated and have vulnerability to all damage. If you drop to 0 hit points, your pot breaks, and your form reverts.
43 For the next minute, you can teleport up to 20 feet as a bonus action on each of your turns.
44 A random creature within 60 feet of you takes 4d10 psychic damage.
45 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.MRxldJd6C4bsBo3O]{Levitate} on yourself.
46 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.yqUDoxk4x0NWG5Bz]{Slow} centered on yourself.
47 A unicorn controlled by the DM appears in a space within 5 feet of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
48 For the next 2d6 days, you leave an icy trail of footprints.
49 You can't speak for the next minute. Whenever you try, pink bubbles float out of your mouth.
50 For the next hour, your voice can't be raised above a whisper.
51 A spectral shield hovers near you for the next minute, granting you a +2 bonus to AC and immunity to @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]{Magic Missile}.
52 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq]{Darkness} centered on yourself.
53 You are immune to being intoxicated by alcohol for the next 5d6 days.
54 The next creature you touch takes 8d6 poison damage.
55 Your hair falls out but grows back within 24 hours.
56 Your spell save DC increases by 2 for the next minute.
57 For the next minute, any flammable object you touch that isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame.
58 Your tongue is partially transmuted into silver for the next 1d4 days, and you have advantage on ability checks made with Charisma during that time.
59 You regain your lowest-level expended spell slot.
60 You cast the etheralness spell targeting yourself, vanishing in a burst of light and leaving behind your slightly smoking boots.
61 For the next minute, you must shout when you speak.
62 You are knocked prone for the next minute and can't get up before then unless another creature uses its action to help you up.
63 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.IBJmWjzbQGu7M4UX]{Fog Cloud} centered on yourself.
64 All items you are wearing or carrying permanently change color.
65 Up to three creatures you choose within 30 feet of you take 4d10 lightning damage.
66 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.8dzaICjGy6mTUaUr]{Bless}, which lasts until the end of your next turn.
67 You are frightened by the nearest creature until the end of your next turn.
d100 Effect
68 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.P3I1DBVUS5S0WBTY]{Witch Bolt} as a 3rd-level spell.
69 Each creature within 30 feet of you becomes invisible for the next minute. The invisibility ends on a creature when it attacks or casts a spell.
70 The earth shakes in a 10 foot radius around you, making that area difficult terrain for all creatures except you.
71 You gain resistance to all damage for the next minute.
72 You gain immunity to disease for 5d6 days.
73 A random creature within 60 feet of you becomes poisoned for 1d4 hours.
74 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.HMLDWBDO71VFLVSX]{Dragon's Breath} on yourself.
75 You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius for the next minute. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you is blinded until the end of its next turn.
76 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.OH8CQXDUQ29S3PSG]{Aura of Vitality}.
77 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]{Polymorph} on yourself. If you fail the saving throw you turn into a sheep for the spell's duration.
78 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.BV0mpbHh29IbbIj5]{Create Food and Water}, which appears scattered across the ground within 30 feet of you.
79 Illusory butterflies and flower petals flutter in the air within 10 feet of you for the next minute.
80 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.5ERVJ8R6Z3K4QSL8]{Warding Wind}.
81 You can take one additional action immediately.
82 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.W2CPO4ABA3D0WW5I]{Wall of Water} encircling yourself.
83 Each creature within 30 feet of you takes 1d10 necrotic damage. You regain hit points equal to the sum of the necrotic damage dealt.
84 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Szvk5FEVQW3uhJi5]{Haste} targeting yourself.
85 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.X4c8xCkmF8U9HUMz]{Mirror Image}
86 You and up to three creatures you choose within 60 feet of you take 6d6 necrotic damage.
87 You cast @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]{Fly} on a random creature within 60 feet of you.
88 For the next minute, your AC becomes 1, and you have a -10 penalty to all saving throws.
89 You become invisible for the next minute. During that time, other creatures can't hear you. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.
90 You and a randomly determined creature swap clothing, including armor.
91 If you die within the next minute, you immediately come back to life as if by the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.zMEo5DKK8uxsuWnq]{Reincarnate} spell.
92 You gain immunity to all damage until the end of your next turn.
93 Your size increases by one size category for the next minute.
94 Illusion magic makes you appear to be a giant toad for 1d4 hours.
95 You and all creatures within 30 feet of you gain vulnerability to piercing damage for the next minute.
96 Debris begins flying around in three spaces of your choice within 60 feet, acting as a @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.7DGGUG6D9ELU81V2]{Cloud of Daggers} spell for 1 minute.
97 You are surrounded by faint, ethereal music for the next minute.
98 Each piece of rope within 30 feet of you is targeted with the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ap4dmtshjEbwU3Ts]{Rope Trick} spell.
99 You regain all expended hit dice.
00 You regain all expended sorcery points.
